tool_description: Analyzes network traffic patterns to identify suspicious activities, communication patterns, and potential threat indicators.

traffic_data.description: Network traffic data in PCAP or flow record format

analysis_timeframe.description: Time window for traffic analysis in ISO 8601 format

detection_rules.description: Custom detection rules for suspicious traffic patterns

error_messages: Invalid traffic data format: Traffic data must be in PCAP or flow record format
Analysis timeframe invalid: Timeframe must be valid ISO 8601 duration
Traffic parsing error: Unable to parse one or more traffic data entries
Detection rule syntax error: One or more detection rules contain syntax errors
Insufficient traffic data: Not enough traffic data for meaningful analysis
usage: Provide network traffic data and analysis timeframe. Optionally include custom detection rules for specific threat patterns.

suspicious_flows.description: Network flows identified as suspicious or anomalous

anomaly_score.description: Overall anomaly score for analyzed traffic
